template.name: viewForm
template.content:
<%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=UTF-8" %> <%@ include file="/WEB-INF/views/include/taglib.jsp"%> ${functionNameSimple}管理
<#assign colno=0 /> <#list table.columnList as c> <#-- 扣除特殊字段 --> <#if c.simpleJavaField != "regDataStatus" && c.simpleJavaField != "regCheckStatus" && c.simpleJavaField != "regSendStatus" && c.simpleJavaField != "regOperateStatus" && c.simpleJavaField != "regOrgNo" && c.simpleJavaField != "createBy" && c.simpleJavaField != "createDate" && c.simpleJavaField != "updateBy" && c.simpleJavaField != "updateDate" && c.simpleJavaField != "delFlag" && c.simpleJavaField != "remarks"> <#if c.isEdit?? && c.isEdit == "1" && c.isNotBaseField> <#if colno%2 == 0>
<#else>
<#if c.showType == "input"> ${"$"}{${className}.${c.javaFieldId}} <#elseif c.showType == "textarea"> ${"$"}{${className}.${c.javaFieldId}} <#elseif c.showType == "select"> ${"$"}{fns:getDictLabels(${className}.${c.javaFieldId}, '${c.dictType}', '')} <#elseif c.showType == "multiselect"> ${"$"}{fns:getDictLabels(${className}.${c.javaFieldId}, '${c.dictType}', '')} <#elseif c.showType == "checkbox"> ${"$"}{${className}.${c.javaFieldId}} <#elseif c.showType == "radiobox"> ${"$"}{${className}.${c.javaFieldId}} <#elseif c.showType == "dateselect"> <#if c.simpleJavaType == "Date"> value="" <#else> ${"$"}{${className}.${c.javaFieldId}} <#elseif c.showType == "userselect"> required" allowClear="true" notAllowSelectParent="true"<#if c.isPk == "1"> disabled="true"/> <#elseif c.showType == "officeselect"> required" allowClear="true" notAllowSelectParent="true"<#if c.isPk == "1"> disabled="true"/> <#elseif c.showType == "areaselect"> required" allowClear="true" notAllowSelectParent="true"<#if c.isPk == "1"> disabled="true"/> <#if c.isNull != "1"> *
<#if colno%2 == 0>
<#else>
<#assign colno = colno + 1 /> <#if colno%2 != 0>
${"$"}{${className}.remarks}
